caption:
This photograph depicts a clinical or medical setting where two individuals are engaged in an activity possibly related to a medical test or examination. The person on the left appears to be a professional, possibly a doctor, who is dressed in a white lab coat with a stethoscope around his neck and a bald head. He is kneeling beside a small stool, focusing intently on a stopwatch he is holding in his hands. This suggests he might be timing a test or monitoring the duration of an activity being performed by the second individual.

The individual on the right is an older man, who is seated on a wooden chair and using an inhalation device, which he holds close to his mouth with both hands. His expression and posture suggest he could be undergoing a respiratory test or treatment. He is dressed in a casual, tan button-up shirt and dark trousers.

The background is relatively sparse, characterized by light-colored walls, a pale floor, and a variety of medical or office-related furnishings and equipment, including a large metal cabinet to the left and another piece of equipment visible in the right corner.

Overall, the atmosphere is that of a medical examination or test, focused on respiratory or pulmonary function, in a setting equipped for healthcare services. The setting and the activities reflect a typical interaction between a healthcare professional and a patient.
title: Dr. Ben V. Branscomb uses a simple tire pump as a breathing aid for a red lung victim. Dr. Branscomb is a leading figure in the fight against air pollution in Birmingham.
